File.AllUsersWebPart:
<WebPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2">
                        <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly>
                        <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName>
                        <ChromeType>None</ChromeType>
                        <FrameType>None</FrameType>
                        <ChromeState>Minimized</ChromeState>
                        <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">
                          <table >
                              <tr>
                                  <td vAlign="top">
                                      <img alt="" src="/_layouts/15/images/doccenter.png?rev=23" >
                                  </td>
                                  <td vAlign="top">
                                      <h1>$Resources:dlccore, DocumentCenterWelcome;</h1>
                                      <p>$Resources:dlccore, DocumentCenterWelcomeDesc;</p>
                                  </td>
                              </tr>
                          </table>
                        </Content>
                    </WebPart>

<WebPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName> <FrameType>None</FrameType> <ChromeType>None</ChromeType> <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor"> <div > <button onclick="javascript:OpenNewFormUrl('$Resources:dlccore,DocumentsFolder;/Forms/upload.aspx');return false;"> <nobr><img style="vertical-align:middle" alt="$Resources:dlccore, DocumentCenterUploadDoc;" src="/_layouts/15/images/uploaddoc.png?rev=23"></img>&nbsp;<span>$Resources:dlccore, DocumentCenterUploadDoc;</span></nobr> </button> </div> </Content> </WebPart>
